post.title: Grafana
post.body:
- https://grafana.com/docs/grafana/latest/getting-started/getting-started/

## Step 1: Install Grafana
https://grafana.com/docs/grafana/latest/installation/

```bash
brew services start grafana

brew services stop grafana
```

## Step 2: Log in

 http://localhost:3000

username and password： admin

## Step 3: Create a dashboard

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24250627/111038865-0fb54280-8466-11eb-8868-1c0c7a44a4cd.png)

## 设置Mysql

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24250627/111038877-222f7c00-8466-11eb-9e89-fa182ff979ae.png)

点击 Data Sources，选择Mysql 填写配置

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24250627/111038906-48edb280-8466-11eb-874e-1c5d83a6114e.png)

## 创建一个 Dashboard

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24250627/111038938-691d7180-8466-11eb-97ff-257dd8893935.png)

写一个最简单的Sql语句并且选择一个 **Visualization** 模块

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24250627/111038956-818d8c00-8466-11eb-98d7-58f6b561b42f.png)

## 创建User

选择User 输入信息创建用户

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24250627/111039189-bc43f400-8467-11eb-808f-0108fbb2a178.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24250627/111039209-cc5bd380-8467-11eb-961c-56696d426d9c.png)
